name: DEVIL'S DOUBLES
description:
Can you beat the Devil in a memory challenge?

That is the premise of this game, but not only must you match as much pairs of devil´s creatures as you can, but also there are some special cards that will help you in the task.

With these special cards you can attack, protect yourself, or regain life if some injuries have been caused to you,... But be careful! For the devil can use them too!
